chapters.title: Chapter 26:  Whitebridge
chapters.info: Owyn Merrilin, p. 332—Thom's nephew, his brother's only son. Thom left his position as Court-bard in the Royal Court of Andor, where he was known from Tear to Maradon as one of the best bards, to help Owyn with some trouble he had with Aes Sedai. See also Merrilin, Thomdril.
